text:
Also a link to the file manager would be great! I have a client that has far to many images with a name like filename-1-1-1-1-2-2-1-1-2-1
And I’m not exaggerating I just went picked a random page in their file manager and found this.
We’ve tried to stop them but there’s no hope! It would also be useful to get be able to search with filepaths as obviously filename-1 will return all the files whereas filename-1.jpg will only return 1
Is this in the HS idea forum anywhere? I'll upvote the heck out of this! ^_^
no, but I can add it :slightly_smiling_face:
